name: BabyBaelJoin
_source: speak;Eirika;You felt another magic source here, Lute?
speak;Lute;Correct.|I think we found something good too.
speak;Lute;This is marvelous!|I've always wanted a pet Bael!
speak;Lute;Yes, it's said their webs make for great book binding!
speak;Eirika;It's a Gargoyle!|There was still one alive!
speak;Lute;I think that Gargoyle is protecting that baby Bael.
speak;Lute;Here, let me take care of this.
speak;Lute;That was a spell to let me commune with monsters.|I learned it just a few days ago.|It's already proving itself quite useful!.
speak;Lute;Excellent!|She says she will join us!

speak;Lute;Gargoyle screeches are quite efficient for communication!|As for her... She seems like a shy girl.|But quite a pleasant one!|She was just protecting the last baby of her best friend.|If we protect the baby, she'll help us.
speak;Eirika;I see...|So these monsters can have friends...
speak;Lute;Well, "friends" is a bit too loaded a term.|They'll still strike each other down rather quickly, if need be.
speak;Eirika;Should we really let these two join us?
speak;Eirika;Well, if you can talk with them, I'll let you deal with them.
speak;Lute;Excellent.|I've got two great names for these two already in mind.
speak;Lute;Now that we've settled that, onwards!
speak;Eirika;My, the odd ways in which this army grows!...
speak;Eirika;I... think it might be best to let these two rest.
speak;Lute;You think so?...|... Oh... Well...|If you say so...
speak;Eirika;Thank you, Lute.|I would feel bad, bringing a baby into battle...
speak;Lute;Well, Baels age fast, so I wouldn't feel that bad.
